XenotypeDef.label: goblin
XenotypeDef.description: Goblins are a small but industrious race, they work faster than most, but their size leaves them generally weaker than others. They are often hard to distinguish at a glance between males and females of the species.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Goblins are a small but industrious race, they work faster than most, but their size leaves them generally weaker than others.
